docs.snippet: Parts of Pedro Hernandez's videotaped confession about strangling a boy in 1979 were replayed at his murder trial on Thursday, this time by his own lawyer arguing it proves mental illness led him to confess to a crime he never committed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Parts of Pedro Hernandez's videotaped confession about strangling a boy in 1979 were replayed at his murder trial on Thursday, this time by his own lawyer arguing it proves mental illness led him to confess to a crime he never committed.

headline.main: Taped Confession in New York Boy's 1979 Murder Replayed for Jury
headline.print_headline: Taped Confession in New York Boy's 1979 Murder Replayed for Jury

docs.snippet: A year after he took office, President Ronald Reagan placed Cuba on a list of state sponsors of terror for backing leftist guerrilla groups in Central and South America....
docs.lead_paragraph: A year after he took office, President Ronald Reagan placed Cuba on a list of state sponsors of terror for backing leftist guerrilla groups in Central and South America.

headline.main: Cuba Sees Obama Terror Promise as Healing of Historic Wound
headline.print_headline: Cuba Sees Obama Terror Promise as Healing of Historic Wound
